message: Progressive capture plan presented. Awaiting your review before proceeding with implementation.
Twilio Sync stores messages in Twilio itself. Fast setup, but limited to messaging only.
Cloudflare can backup Neo4j dumps to R2. Cannot host Neo4j itself. Local plus backup recommended.
Continuation prompt complete. Cloudflare plus Twilio architecture ready for Phase 2 execution.
Backup strategy outlined with drive recommendations. Ready for Phase 2 Cloudflare setup.
Created Omni Capture master plan with six phases, dependencies, and detailed task checklists.
